description.zh-cn: 中国女企业家，为中国前国务院总理李鹏之女。曾任中国大唐集团副总经理、中国电力国际发展有限公司董事长等职，被称为中国“电力一姐”。她亦曾任第十一届、十二届全国政协委员。
description.en: Chinese businesswoman and the daughter of former Chinese Premier Li Peng. She has served as Deputy General Manager of China Datang Corporation and Chairman of China Power International Development, and is known as the 'First Sister of Chinese Power'. She also served as a member of the 11th and 12th National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理、全国人民代表大会常务委员会委员长。李小琳的父亲。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the Premier of the People's Republic of China and Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress. He is the father of Li Xiaolin.

description.zh-cn: 李鹏的夫人，李小琳的母亲。
description.en: Wife of Li Peng and mother of Li Xiaolin.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，李小琳的兄长。现任中华人民共和国交通运输部部长，曾任山西省省长。
description.en: Chinese politician and the elder brother of Li Xiaolin. He is the current Minister of Transport of the People's Republic of China and former Governor of Shanxi.

description.zh-cn: 李小琳的弟弟，现居新加坡。
description.en: Younger brother of Li Xiaolin, currently residing in Singapore.

description.zh-cn: 李小琳的丈夫，曾在中国新华保险公司、北华信电子集团等企业担任高管。
description.en: Husband of Li Xiaolin. He has held senior executive positions in companies such as China Xinhua Insurance Company and North Huaxin Electronic Group.

description.zh-cn: 李小琳与刘智源的独生女，曾任瑞士信贷（香港）副总裁、中国银行（香港）董事总经理。
description.en: The only daughter of Li Xiaolin and Liu Zhiyuan. She has served as Vice President of Credit Suisse (Hong Kong) and Managing Director of Bank of China (Hong Kong).

description.zh-cn: 中国教育家，李小琳的祖母。
description.en: Chinese educator and paternal grandmother of Li Xiaolin.

description.zh-cn: 中国前政治人物，曾任海南省副省长、周永康秘书。据报道，他曾协助李小琳在海南获取土地。
description.en: Former Chinese politician who served as Vice Governor of Hainan Province and secretary to Zhou Yongkang. He reportedly assisted Li Xiaolin in acquiring land in Hainan.

description.zh-cn: 中国前政治人物，曾任中共中央政治局常委。冀文林曾长期担任其秘书。
description.en: Former Chinese politician who served as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the CCP. Ji Wenlin was his long-term secretary.

description.zh-cn: 中国辽宁省的省会，李小琳的出生地。
description.en: The capital city of Liaoning Province, China, and the birthplace of Li Xiaolin.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国的电力高等院校，李小琳曾在此就读职工大专。
description.en: A higher education institution in China specializing in electric power. Li Xiaolin attended its staff college program.

description.zh-cn: 中国顶尖高等学府，李小琳在此获得工学硕士学位。
description.en: A top university in China where Li Xiaolin obtained her Master of Engineering degree.

description.zh-cn: 中国特大型电力企业集团，李小琳曾在此担任副总经理。
description.en: A major state-owned power generation enterprise in China where Li Xiaolin served as Deputy General Manager.

zh-cn: 中国电力国际发展有限公司

description.zh-cn: 在香港上市的电力公司，李小琳曾任董事长。
description.en: A power company listed in Hong Kong, where Li Xiaolin served as Chairman.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会
en: National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议的全国组织，是中国人民爱国统一战线的组织形式。李小琳曾任第十一届、十二届委员。
description.en: The national organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference (CPPCC), which serves as a key mechanism for multiparty cooperation and political consultation. Li Xiaolin served as a member of its 11th and 12th committees.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国电力工业部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国电力工业部
en: Ministry of Electric Power Industry of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院曾经存在的组成部门，主管全国电力工业。李小琳曾在此任职。
description.en: A former constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for the national electric power industry. Li Xiaolin once worked here.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国负责能源行业管理的国家局。李小琳曾在此前身机构国家能源部任职。
description.en: The national bureau responsible for energy industry management in the People's Republic of China. Li Xiaolin worked at its predecessor, the Ministry of Energy.

zh-cn: 中国电力投资集团公司

description.zh-cn: 中国国家电力投资集团公司的前身之一，李小琳曾在此担任常务副总经理。
description.en: One of the predecessors of the State Power Investment Corporation, where Li Xiaolin served as Executive Vice General Manager.

description.zh-cn: 一批泄露的机密文件，揭示了全球多国权贵利用离岸公司进行财务操作。文件中提及了李小琳及其丈夫。
description.en: A collection of leaked confidential documents that revealed the financial dealings of powerful individuals worldwide using offshore companies. The documents mentioned Li Xiaolin and her husband.

description.zh-cn: 一个全球性的调查记者网络，曾揭露材料指李小琳在瑞士银行有存款。
description.en: A global network of investigative journalists that revealed documents indicating Li Xiaolin had deposits in a Swiss bank.

description.zh-cn: 一份中文国际新闻周刊，曾刊发调查报道涉及李小琳在海南的土地交易。
description.en: An international Chinese newsweekly that published an investigative report concerning Li Xiaolin's land deals in Hainan.

description.zh-cn: 英国的一家报纸，曾报道李小琳卷入外资进入中国保险业的交易。
description.en: A British newspaper that reported on Li Xiaolin's alleged involvement in transactions related to foreign investment in China's insurance industry.

description.zh-cn: 一家巴拿马的律师事务所，“巴拿马文件”的来源。该律所曾协助李小琳设立离岸公司。
description.en: A Panamanian law firm and the source of the 'Panama Papers'. The firm assisted Li Xiaolin in setting up an offshore company.

description.zh-cn: 据“巴拿马文件”披露，这是由李小琳和其丈夫刘智源在列支敦斯登成立的基金。
description.en: According to the 'Panama Papers', this is a foundation established in Liechtenstein by Li Xiaolin and her husband Liu Zhiyuan.

description.zh-cn: 一家在英属维尔京群岛开设的公司，据“巴拿马文件”披露，其单一股东为李小琳夫妇成立的Silo基金。
description.en: A company incorporated in the British Virgin Islands, whose sole shareholder, according to the 'Panama Papers', was the Fondation Silo, established by Li Xiaolin and her husband.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国交通运输部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国交通运输部
en: Ministry of Transport of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院下辖的负责交通运输工作的部门。李小琳的兄长李小鹏现任该部部长。
description.en: The department under the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for transportation. Li Xiaolin's brother, Li Xiaopeng, is the current minister.

description.zh-cn: 中国山西省的省级行政机关。李小琳的兄长李小鹏曾任山西省省长。
description.en: The provincial-level administrative body of Shanxi Province, China. Li Xiaolin's brother, Li Xiaopeng, formerly served as its governor.

description.zh-cn: 一家中国保险公司，李小琳的丈夫刘智源曾在此担任总经理助理。
description.en: A Chinese insurance company where Li Xiaolin's husband, Liu Zhiyuan, served as an assistant general manager.

description.zh-cn: 一家电子集团公司，李小琳的丈夫刘智源曾任该集团总经理及董事长。
description.en: An electronics group company where Li Xiaolin's husband, Liu Zhiyuan, served as General Manager and Chairman.

nodes.id: 浙江信联股份有限公司

zh-cn: 浙江信联股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 一家股份有限公司，李小琳的丈夫刘智源曾任董事。
description.en: A joint-stock limited company where Li Xiaolin's husband, Liu Zhiyuan, served as a director.

description.zh-cn: 一家全球性的金融服务公司，李小琳的女儿李琳暄曾任其香港分部副总裁。
description.en: A global financial services company. Li Xiaolin's daughter, Li Linxuan, served as a vice president in its Hong Kong office.

description.zh-cn: 香港的一家主要商业银行集团，李小琳的女儿李琳暄曾任其董事总经理。
description.en: A major commercial banking group in Hong Kong. Li Xiaolin's daughter, Li Linxuan, served as its managing director.

description.zh-cn: 李小琳是李鹏的长女。
description.en: Li Xiaolin is the eldest daughter of Li Peng.

description.zh-cn: 李小琳是朱琳的女儿。
description.en: Li Xiaolin is the daughter of Zhu Lin.

description.zh-cn: 李小琳是李小鹏的姐姐。
description.en: Li Xiaolin is the elder sister of Li Xiaopeng.

description.zh-cn: 李小琳是李小勇的姐姐。
description.en: Li Xiaolin is the elder sister of Li Xiaoyong.

description.zh-cn: 李小琳与刘智源是夫妻关系。
description.en: Li Xiaolin and Liu Zhiyuan are spouses.

description.zh-cn: 李琳暄是李小琳的女儿。
description.en: Li Linxuan is the daughter of Li Xiaolin.

description.zh-cn: 赵君陶是李小琳的祖母。
description.en: Zhao Juntao is Li Xiaolin's paternal grandmother.

description.zh-cn: 李小琳于1961年6月1日出生于辽宁省沈阳市。
description.en: Li Xiaolin was born in Shenyang, Liaoning Province on June 1, 1961.

description.zh-cn: 李小琳曾就读于华北电力大学职工大专。
description.en: Li Xiaolin attended the staff college program at North China Electric Power University.

degree.zh-cn: 电力系统及自动化专业工学硕士
degree.en: Master of Engineering in Power System and its Automation

description.zh-cn: 李小琳于1988年从清华大学毕业，获得工学硕士学位。
description.en: Li Xiaolin graduated from Tsinghua University in 1988 with a Master of Engineering degree.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国电力工业部

description.zh-cn: 李小琳曾在电力工业部华北电业管理局担任技术员和工程师。
description.en: Li Xiaolin worked as a technician and engineer at the North China Electric Power Administration Bureau under the Ministry of Electric Power Industry.

position.en: Deputy Director of the Economic and Trade Division, International Department

description.zh-cn: 1986年，李小琳调任国家能源部（国家能源局前身）任国际司经贸处副处长。
description.en: In 1986, Li Xiaolin was transferred to the Ministry of Energy (predecessor of the National Energy Administration) to serve as Deputy Director of the Economic and Trade Division in the International Department.

description.zh-cn: 1998年，李小琳出任中国电力投资集团公司常务副总经理。此前她曾于1996年担任公司总经理助理。
description.en: In 1998, Li Xiaolin became the Executive Vice General Manager of China Power Investment Corporation. She had previously served as an assistant to the general manager since 1996.

description.zh-cn: 自2008年起，李小琳兼任中国电力国际发展有限公司董事长。
description.en: Since 2008, Li Xiaolin has also served as the Chairman of China Power International Development Limited.

position.en: Deputy General Manager, Party Leadership Group Member

description.zh-cn: 李小琳于2015年7月调任中国大唐集团，担任副总经理和党组成员，直至2018年5月退休。
description.en: Li Xiaolin was transferred to China Datang Corporation in July 2015, serving as Deputy General Manager and a member of the Party Leadership Group until her retirement in May 2018.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 李小琳曾担任第十一届、十二届全国政协委员。
description.en: Li Xiaolin served as a member of the 11th and 12th National Committees of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 据《亚洲周刊》报道，在时任海南省副省长冀文林的协助下，李小琳获批海南博鳌乐城的五幅土地。
description.en: According to Yazhou Zhoukan, with the assistance of then-Vice Governor of Hainan, Ji Wenlin, Li Xiaolin was granted five plots of land in Boao Lecheng, Hainan.

description.zh-cn: 冀文林曾长期担任周永康的秘书。
description.en: Ji Wenlin served as Zhou Yongkang's secretary for a long period.

description.zh-cn: 巴拿马文件泄露事件显示，李小琳与其丈夫刘智源在欧洲列支敦斯登成立基金，并为一家英属维尔京群岛公司的单一股东。
description.en: The Panama Papers leak revealed that Li Xiaolin and her husband Liu Zhiyuan established a foundation in Liechtenstein, which was the sole shareholder of a company in the British Virgin Islands.

description.zh-cn: 国际调查记者联盟（ICIJ）揭露材料显示，李小琳在汇丰银行有248万美元存款。
description.en: The International Consortium of Investigative Journalists (ICIJ) revealed materials showing that Li Xiaolin had a deposit of US$2.48 million at HSBC.

description.zh-cn: 《亚洲周刊》刊发调查报道，指李小琳在冀文林协助下，以离岸公司获批价值逾百亿人民币的海南土地。
description.en: Yazhou Zhoukan published an investigative report alleging that Li Xiaolin, with the assistance of Ji Wenlin, obtained land in Hainan worth over ten billion RMB through an offshore company.

description.zh-cn: 英国《每日电讯报》报道称，李小琳卷入外资进入中国保险业的交易。
description.en: The British newspaper The Daily Telegraph reported that Li Xiaolin was involved in transactions concerning foreign investment in China's insurance industry.

description.zh-cn: 根据“巴拿马文件”，李小琳和丈夫刘智源在欧洲列支敦斯登成立了Silo基金。
description.en: According to the 'Panama Papers', Li Xiaolin and her husband Liu Zhiyuan established the Fondation Silo in Liechtenstein.

description.zh-cn: 根据“巴拿马文件”，刘智源和妻子李小琳在欧洲列支敦斯登成立了Silo基金。
description.en: According to the 'Panama Papers', Liu Zhiyuan and his wife Li Xiaolin established the Fondation Silo in Liechtenstein.

description.zh-cn: Silo基金是Cofic Investments公司在英属维尔京群岛的单一股东。
description.en: Fondation Silo was the sole shareholder of Cofic Investments, a company in the British Virgin Islands.

description.zh-cn: 莫萨克·冯赛卡律师行处理了为李小琳夫妇设立Cofic Investments公司的法律事务。
description.en: Mossack Fonseca handled the legal affairs for the establishment of Cofic Investments for Li Xiaolin and her husband.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国交通运输部

description.zh-cn: 李小鹏现任中华人民共和国交通运输部部长。
description.en: Li Xiaopeng is the current Minister of Transport of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 李小鹏曾任山西省省长。
description.en: Li Xiaopeng previously served as the Governor of Shanxi Province.

description.zh-cn: 刘智源曾担任中国新华保险公司总经理助理。
description.en: Liu Zhiyuan served as Assistant General Manager of New China Life Insurance.

description.zh-cn: 刘智源曾担任北华信电子集团总经理、董事长。
description.en: Liu Zhiyuan served as General Manager and Chairman of North Huaxin Electronic Group.

description.zh-cn: 李琳暄曾任瑞士信贷（香港）副总裁。
description.en: Li Linxuan previously served as Vice President of Credit Suisse (Hong Kong).

description.zh-cn: 李琳暄曾任中国银行（香港）董事总经理。
description.en: Li Linxuan previously served as Managing Director of Bank of China (Hong Kong).
